be.unamur.info.b314.compiler.main

Class Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.unamur.info.b314.compiler.main.Symbol
      • be.unamur.info.b314.compiler.main.Function
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scope

    public class Function
extends Symbol
implements Scope
    The Function class is an extension of the Symbol class, implementing the Scope interface. It is used to represent a B314 function; the attributes include a Symbol map, a ScopeName, an enclosing Scope and a parameter array.
    Author:
    Valentin Eggermont - valentin.eggermont@student.unamur.be, William Turatsinze - william.turatsinze@student.unamur.be, Thomas Vanhaeren - thomas.vanhaeren@student.unamur.be
